Event.Message: MinutesSinceLastIncident (%1), EnergyConsumptionTrackedDurationInMinutes (%2), FullChargeCapacity (%3), ChargeCapacityRatio (%4), MinTimePeriod (%5), TriggerDrainRate (%6), PoDc (%7), MonitorOn (%8), LongtermTimer (%9), FirstUploadSinceBoot (%10), ResourceUsageTrackedDurationRatio (%11), JoulesConsumed (%12)
